# flan-t5-cbp-lkg-alt-mlm-w-context-small

Google's Flan T5 model ([flan-t5-small](https://huggingface.co/google/flan-t5-small)) trained over a cleaned version of the Legal Knowledge Graph using the span-masking MLM objective with additional sentences alongside the prompts.
